subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: For Tanya Alford, the wife of U.C.L.A. Coach Steve Alford, this year’s tournament is special, as her two sons are also playing for the Bruins.
snippet: For Tanya Alford, the wife of U.C.L.A. Coach Steve Alford, this year’s tournament is special, as her two sons are also playing for the Bruins.
